participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Motivated and optimistic, always looking for ways to inspire others to lead a healthier lifestyle.
participant_1.background: i am a cancer survivor. i am a clean eater. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i love running and preparing for marathons.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, enjoys taking risks and embracing the skateboarding culture.
participant_2.background: i'm always wearing a hat. i've a broken arm. my favourite skater is rob dryden. my friends are all skateboarders.
